Work

What the BLEEP Shloud I Watch?

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6

This web app is one of my all-time favorite creations! While still in continuous development, it currently takes inputs from the user like movie rating they would be open to watching and which genres sound interesting to them at the moment. It then outputs 10 movie titles that fit the users search parameters. Not only that, but we have functionality that allows the users to find a streaming service that the movie can be viewed on. Upon search, you are shown a list of every subscription streaming service that the searched movie is availible on! We hope you finally find an answer to the question, "What the BLEEP Should I Watch?!?!"
